channel.title: Java is going FULLY open source
channel.description: Opinions? I am thinking I can make a package in it to make user input hella easier.

item.title: Java is going FULLY open source
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:29, topic:422603”][quote author=John459 link=topic=525265.msg3828094#msg3828094 date=1322345956]

This community is pathetic. From the first post on, there is no respect for another user. Not one post but the original deals with what the topic actually is. Instead, they’re all insults and pointless arguments that don’t make two shits of a difference. I hope you’re all real proud.

Including the post you just made. Hypocrite.
[/quote]That was a test you just failed. Congratulations.[/quote]

So what you’re saying is you purposely contradicted yourself in hope that one would further derail this thread?

I find that hard to believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Java is going FULLY open source
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Lin:

This community is pathetic. From the first post on, there is no respect for another user. Not one post but the original deals with what the topic actually is. Instead, they’re all insults and pointless arguments that don’t make two shits of a difference. I hope you’re all real proud.

Trying to turn this community’s behavior into good, helpful, and mature is a lost cause. Just stating the facts man. There’s always going to be that one asshole that turns everyone into Sour Sophies.

Read full topic
